amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 116-457 to prohibit any funding for new nuclear testing in FY21.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for new nuclear testing in fiscal year 2021.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McAdams amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 179 (Roll no. 142).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
